body_html: @suharshs The use case is reinforcement learning with the environment ticking a few time steps ahead of the agent to allow to parallelize the two. Both environment and agent fully live in graph and communicate via queues. The agent sends actions with a queue to the environment, which gets consumed by a queue runner that steps the environment. Moreover, the environment provides queues containing observations, rewards, and done flags that the agent should peek() at.

Moreover, the environment provides queues containing observations, rewards, and done flags that the agent should peek() at.
body: @suharshs The use case is reinforcement learning with the environment ticking a few time steps ahead of the agent to allow to parallelize the two. Both environment and agent fully live in graph and communicate via queues. The agent sends actions with a queue to the environment, which gets consumed by a queue runner that steps the environment. Moreover, the environment provides queues containing observations, rewards, and done flags that the agent should `peek()` at.
